name: Create a deposit of a value greater than zero
scenarioId: classpath:features/transaction/create_deposit:Create a deposit of a value greater than zero
methodName: Create a deposit of a value greater than zero

testSteps.description: Given the user has an active account in Tyny Bank
When the user makes a deposit of "100.00"
Then the account balance is increased by "100.00"

reportData.title: Transaction Final State
reportData.contents: <200 OK OK,RestResponse(message=Transaction Registered Successfully, data={id=f9c3ea5e-404e-4a60-b658-536f1efde481, originAccountId=202401230001, destinationAccountId=null, amount=100.0, type=DEPOSIT, accountBalanceCurrentValue=100.0, accountDestinationBalanceCurrentValue=0.0, date=2024-12-26T02:39:50.845404376}),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Thu, 26 Dec 2024 02:39:50 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

userStory.narrative:
The deposit transaction is a credit to the account balance that is created when a user makes a deposit. The deposit
  must be a transaction with value greater than zero and it only needs the origin account (in this case is the account
  addressed to apply the deposit operation, not the account which money is being sent to).

  **As a** Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** deposit a value in a bank account
  **So that I can** credit value to my account balance

title: Create a deposit of a value greater than zero

rule.name: A deposit to a user account must be a value greater than zero
